COTM.Name: Nazir Ahmed Sabbir
COTM.Details: Nazir Ahmed Sabbir is just a College student from Bangladesh but passionate about Mozilla. His enthusiasm inspires us and rest of the Community. Hence, we are recognizing Sabbir as the Contributor of the Month for October. Read more from here - http://blog.mozillabd.org/contributor-month-october

LatestNews.Title: Upcoming Events of Mozilla QA Bangladesh
LatestNews.Details: Friday, October 30th, we are organizing Firefox 43.0 Aurora Testday. We will be focusing our testing on the new Add-ons Signing feature, and last but not least, Search Suggestions and Unified Autocomplete.This event will be going for whole day in Online. No previous experience is needed to join our events. To participate, Just join our Facebook group (https://www.facebook.com/groups/mozqabd/ ), and give a shoutout that you want to join!

Block1.Title: What is Mozilla QA?
Block1.Details: For making the web open and for getting most of the benefit of the web, Mozilla has been working on several projects and products that help users over the Web. Mozilla is built by volunteers around the world who are working to make the web more better and move Mozillaâ€™s mission forward! A part of Mozilla that helps to make an impact on the project, and on the web is: Mozilla QA!! Mozilla QA is guild of individuals united by a common passion to make the quality of the products Mozilla creates the best it can possibly be! What Mozilla QA do, is to ensure the same Quality in every feature and product Mozilla is giving to the users of the web that It has been giving for years! Before giving to the world, The Mozilla QA Team test the Quality of the product or the feature first, so people can get the best out of it!

Block2.Title: Join Our Community Call
Block2.Details: Generally, We host Community calls in every 2 Weeks. Community Calls are the best way to get updated about our activities! We share all our activities and Upcoming updates in the call. To get updated, join our next community call
